metadata.synopsis: The dialogue with Steel Watchers near the ship for Tadpole Transport booster. These watchers are guarding the ship and tell to go away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. goto -212; 1; -1343. Talk to steel watchers

0.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
0.text: Halt, citizen. This is a restricted area.

1.speaker: GROUP_SteelWatchers
1.text: Trespassing in restricted areas is not tolerated, miscreant.
